text: The 1998 FIA Cross Country Rally World Cup season was the 6th season of the FIA Cross Country Rally World Cup. Jean-Louis Schlesser was the drivers' champion driving his own buggy. Mitsubishi won the Manufacturers' cup. ==Calendar== The calendar featured seven events. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%" ! Round ! Dates !
